data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Graceful degradation when agent confused". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Quote header + quote line versioning". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.
